headline: $105+ Bn Battery Energy Storage System (BESS) Markets - Global Forecast to 2030 with LG Energy, Panasonic, BYD, Samsung, Tesla Dominating
summary: The global battery energy storage system (BESS) market is set to experience a remarkable growth trajectory, with a projected CAGR of 15.8%, expanding from USD 50.81 billion in 2025 to USD 105.96 billion by 2030. This growth is fueled by the increasing adoption of renewable energy sources like solar and wind, escalating electricity consumption, and the demand for advanced energy management. headline: Tesla Reboot Raises Questions On EV Weakness And High‑Risk New Bets
summary: Tesla, NasdaqGS:TSLA, is contending with accelerating executive departures that are raising fresh concerns about internal stability. The company is reporting sharp drops in vehicle sales in both the US and China and has discontinued the Model S and Model X lines. Management is placing greater emphasis on humanoid robots, robotaxis and large scale solar projects, shifting attention away from the core car business. Tesla shares most recently closed at $417.44, with the stock up 17.3% over the...

headline: China's humanoid robots ready for Lunar New Year showtime
summary: China's most-watched TV show, the annual CCTV Spring Festival gala, will be viewed later on Monday as a showcase for the country's cutting-edge industrial policy and Beijing's push to dominate humanoid robots and the future of manufacturing.  Four ‌rising humanoid robot startups - Unitree Robotics, Galbot, Noetix and MagicLab -  are set to showcase their products in the gala, a televised event ‌and touchstone for China comparable to the Super Bowl for the United States.  The hype surrounding China's humanoid robot sector comes as major players including AgiBot and Unitree prepare for initial ​public offerings this year and domestic artificial intelligence startups release a raft of frontier models during the lucrative nine-day Lunar New Year public holiday.

headline: Eric Schmidt Says 'We're Running Out Of Electricity,' Urges Space Data Centers — SpaceX CEO Elon Musk Quips: 'If Only There Were A Company'
summary: Elon Musk reacted to Eric Schmidt's warning that AI growth could create a 92-gigawatt power shortfall, hinting that SpaceX and his newly merged xAI venture could help address the energy bottleneck through space-based data centers.

headline: Elon Musk Has 75% Chance Of Becoming Trillionaire In 2026, Says He's Helped Others 'Thousands Of Times Over' In Creating Wealth
summary: Elon Musk said his $849.3 billion net worth is almost entirely tied to his stakes in Tesla and SpaceX, with less than 0.1% held in cash, as speculation grows about him becoming a trillionaire following SpaceX's merger with xAI and rising odds on Kalshi.
